AT.name: Mario & Luigi™: Zusammen durch die Zeit
AT.description: In diesem zeitwindenden Abenteuer verbünden sich Mario und Luigi, die heldenhaften Brüder, mit jüngeren Ausgaben von sich selbst, um eine neue Bedrohung abzuwenden: Pilz-artige Aliens bekannt als Shroobs! In Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time steuerst du die Helden von heute und gestern und benutzt deren besondere Fähigkeiten, um beim Kampfgeschehen tatkräftig mit rechtzeitigem Knopfdrücken mitzuwirken. Dieses urkomische Rollenspiel-Abenteuer bietet verrückte Unterhaltung und Auftritte all deiner Lieblingscharaktere, von Yoshi bis zu Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Zusammen durch die Zeit: Video

AU.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time
AU.description: Mario and Luigi team up with their younger selves in a time-twisting, tongue-in-cheek tale that sees the heroic brothers face a new foe: mushroom-like aliens known as Shroobs! In Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, take control of both adult and baby versions of the heroes, and use their unique skills in the battle scenes as you get hands-on to hit the right buttons at the right moment. This hilarious role-playing adventure features a wacky sense of humour and appearances by all your favourite characters, from Yoshi to Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time: Video

BG.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time
BG.description: Mario and Luigi team up with their younger selves in a time-twisting, tongue-in-cheek tale that sees the heroic brothers face a new foe: mushroom-like aliens known as Shroobs! In Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, take control of both adult and baby versions of the heroes, and use their unique skills in the battle scenes as you get hands-on to hit the right buttons at the right moment. This hilarious role-playing adventure features a wacky sense of humour and appearances by all your favourite characters, from Yoshi to Baby Bowser.

BE.name: Mario & Luigi™: Les frères du Temps
BE.description: Mario et Luigi font équipe avec les Mario et Luigi du passé dans un conte de voyage dans le temps plein d'ironie où ils affronteront de nouveaux ennemis : les Xhampis, des aliens champignons ! Dans Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, contrôlez à la fois les bébés héros et leurs versions adultes, et utilisez leurs techniques hors du commun dans des combats en appuyant sur les bons boutons, au bon moment. Vous retrouverez dans ce jeu de rôle tordant à l'humour farfelu tous vos personnages préférés, de Yoshi à Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Les frères du Temps : vidéo

ES.name: Mario & Luigi™: Compañeros en el Tiempo
ES.description: Mario y Luigi se unen a sus yos jóvenes en una historia a través del tiempo cargada de humor inteligente. Estos dos héroes se enfrentarán a un nuevo enemigo: ¡extraterrestres con forma de champiñón conocidos como Shroobs! En Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, controla las versiones adultas y bebés de los héroes y usa sus habilidades únicas durante los combates, pulsando los botones correctos en el momento adecuado. Este juego de rol desternillante cuenta con un sentido del humor disparatado y con apariciones estelares de tus personajes favoritos, de Yoshi a Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Compañeros en el Tiempo: Vídeo

IT.name: Mario & Luigi™: Fratelli nel Tempo
IT.description: Mario e Luigi si uniscono a se stessi da giovani in una spassosa avventura nel tempo in cui i nostri eroici fratelli affrontano un nuovo nemico: i funghi alieni noti come gli Shroob! In Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, guiderai sia le versioni adulte sia quelle giovani degli eroi, sfruttando le loro capacità uniche in scene di lotta in cui devi premere i giusti pulsanti nel momento esatto. Questa esilarante avventura di ruolo vanta di uno stravagante senso dell'umorismo e di comparse di tutti i tuoi personaggi preferiti, da Yoshi fino a Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Fratelli nel Tempo: video

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time: Video

NL.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time
NL.description: Mario en Luigi sluiten zich aan bij hun jongere ik in een tijdbuigend, komisch avontuur waarin de broers de confrontatie aangaan met nieuwe vijanden: paddenstoel-achtige aliens genaamd Shroobs! In Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, bestuur je zowel de volwassen als de baby versies van de helden, en gebruik je hun unieke vaardigheden in de gevechten waarbij je op de juiste momenten op de juiste knoppen moet drukken. Deze hilarische RPG bevat een wonderlijk gevoel voor humor en gastrollen van al je favoriete personages, van Yoshi tot Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time: Video

NZ.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time
NZ.description: Mario and Luigi team up with their younger selves in a time-twisting, tongue-in-cheek tale that sees the heroic brothers face a new foe: mushroom-like aliens known as Shroobs! In Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, take control of both adult and baby versions of the heroes, and use their unique skills in the battle scenes as you get hands-on to hit the right buttons at the right moment. This hilarious role-playing adventure features a wacky sense of humour and appearances by all your favourite characters, from Yoshi to Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time: Video

PT.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time
PT.description: Mario e Luigi juntam-se a versões mais novas de si próprios, viajando no tempo numa aventura cheia de ironia que levará estes heróis a enfrentar um novo inimigo: alienígenas parecidos com cogumelos, conhecidos como Shroobs! Em Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time, controla as versões adultas e infantis destes heróis e usa as suas capacidades únicas nos cenários de batalha para acertares nos botões certos, no momento certo. Uma hilariante aventura RPG com um sentido de humor tresloucado, onde aparecem todos os teus personagens favoritos, desde o Yoshi ao Bowser Bebé.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time: Vídeo

RU.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time
RU.description: В этом изумительном приключении, братья-герои Mario и Luigi объединяют силы со своими более юными версиями из прошлого, чтобы сразиться с новым врагом - грибообразными пришельцами Shroobs! В Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time вы сможете управлять как взрослыми, так и юными версиями наших героев. Используйте особые способности во время битв, нажимая на нужные кнопки в нужный момент. В этом веселом ролевом приключении вы встретите много уже хорошо известных вам персонажей от Yoshi до Baby Bowser.

movies.name: Mario & Luigi™: Partners in Time: видео
